nodeList.altText: Each point of intelligence grants 4% ward retention and improves skills that rely on carefully studied magic, such as Lightning Blast and Mana Strike.
nodeList.nodeDescription:
Grants [1] intelligence per point

Grants [4] elemental protection per point
Grants [7] health and [3] mana per point

nodeList.altText: Fire, cold, and lightning damage are all considered elemental damage.
nodeList.description: Increases your elemental damage
nodeList.nodeDescription: Grants [7%] increased elemental damage per point

nodeList.altText: Ward is a shield that protects your health. It has no maximum and decays over time.
nodeList.description: When you drop below 70% health you are granted a burst of ward. This effect has a 12 second cooldown.
nodeList.nodeDescription: When you drop below 70% health you gain [10] ward per point. This effect has a 12 second cooldown.

nodeList.description: Every 3 seconds, your next elemental spell deals increased damage and has a chance to slow enemies on hit.
nodeList.nodeDescription: Every 3 seconds your next spell deals [20%] increased damage per point
Grants [3%] increased cast speed and melee attack speed per point

nodeList.altText: {Arcane Lightning} is a single target lightning spell. Its damage is increased by intelligence and by increases to lightning damage and spell damage.
nodeList.description: Your next lightning ability that hits an enemy casts {Arcane Lightning} at additional enemies, dealing lightning damage. This effect has an 8 second cooldown.
nodeList.nodeDescription: Every 10 seconds when you hit an enemy with a lightning ability you cast arcane lightning at up to [1] other enem[y] around them per point.

node.altText: Fire, cold, and lightning damage are all considered elemental damage.
node.description: Increases your elemental damage
node.nodeDescription: Grants [7%] increased elemental damage per point

nodeList.altText: This effect can ignite the enemy you hit unless it is killed by the hit.
nodeList.description: Your next fire ability that hits an enemy ignites additional nearby enemies. This effect has an 8 second cooldown.
nodeList.nodeDescription: Every 10 seconds when you hit an enemy with a fire ability you ignite up to [1] enem[y] around them per point.

node.altText: Fire, cold, and lightning damage are all considered elemental damage.

nodeList.nodeDescription: Grants [7%] increased critical strike chance, and [3%] additional critical strike multiplier.

nodeList.altText: Shock reduces lightning resistance by 5%, increases chance to be stunned by 10%, lasts 4 seconds, and can stack up to 20 times. It has 60% reduced effect against bosses and players.

[6%] increased fire damage per point

[2%] chance to ignite per point on hit with fire skills per point
[12%] increased elemental damage per point if you have used a potion in the past 4 seconds.
[20%] increased critical strike chance with spells per point

nodeList.description: Whenever you take a hit that leaves you below half health, you freeze nearby enemies. This effect has a 10 second cooldown.

+[25%] freeze rate multiplier per point

When you take a hit that leaves you below half health you freeze up to [1] nearby enem[y] (10 second cooldown)

nodeList.description: You have an increased chance to critically strike with spells. This effect is doubled for lightning skills.

[2%] increased ignite duration per point

nodeList.description: You are granted increased damage with an element whenever you have casted a spell of another element recently (last 4 seconds).

stats.statName: Increased Lightning Damage From Fire Skill Use
Increased Fire Damage From Cold Skill Use
Increased Cold Damage From Lightning Skill Use

nodeList.description:
You have a chance to be granted ward whenever you hit an enemy with a fire, cold, or lightning skill.

This effect has a 10 second cooldown, but the cooldown is not shared between different elements, so you can gain ward from a fire hit and a lightning hit within the same 10 second duration.
nodeList.nodeDescription:
Gain [10] ward per point when you hit an enemy with a fire spell (10 second cooldown)

Gain [10] ward per point when you hit an enemy with a cold spell (10 second cooldown)

Gain [10] ward per point when you hit an enemy with a lightning spell (10 second cooldown)
[50%] increased effect of shock per point

stats.statName: Increased Stun Duration with Lightning Spells

nodeList.nodeDescription:
+[1] adaptive spell damage per point

Triple if you have at least 200 maximum mana

stats.statName: Value Tripled If You Have 200 Maximum Mana

nodeList.description: You are granted an additional chance to apply an elemental ailment with skills of the same element whenever you have casted a spell of another element recently (last 4 seconds).

nodeList.altText: Arcane Shield's damage reduction is multiplicative with other modifiers.
nodeList.description: You gain Arcane Shield for 4 seconds when you use an melee attack and hit at least one enemy. Arcane Shield is a buff that reduces damage taken and generates ward, but does not stack.

nodeList.altText: Fire Aura is a fire spell that deals damage over time to enemies around you for four seconds.
nodeList.description:
Each second if you are moving or using a melee attack you have chance to cast Fire Aura. This chance is doubled if you do not have an active Fire Aura.

You can have multiple stacks of Fire Aura active at once.

nodeList.description:
When you use a melee attack that costs less than 10 mana you gain a stack of {Blade Weaving}.

When you use a melee attack that costs 10 or more mana the stacks are consumed and the attack deals 15% more elemental damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) per stack consumed.

node.description:
Increases your chance to freeze and converts lightning blast and volcanic orb to cold spells, changing their base damage type to cold and giving them a chance to freeze.

Lightning Blast gains a base freeze rate of 46.

Volcanic Orb's core gains a base freeze rate of 40 and its shrapnel gains a freeze rate of 32.

nodeList.altText:

Grants fire damage and ignite chance if you have used a lightning skill in the past 4 seconds.

Grants cold damage and chill chance if you have used a fire skill in the past 4 seconds.
nodeList.description:
Cycles the effects {Dragon Mage} and {Dragon Breath}.

For example, using a fire skill now gives a bonus to cold damage and chill chance with cold skills, instead of lightning damage shock chance with lightning skills.
nodeList.nodeDescription:
Reverses the direction of the effects of Dragon Mage and Dragon Breath.

For example, using a fire skill now gives a bonus to cold damage and chill chance with cold skills instead of lightning damage shock chance with lightning skills.

nodeList.description:
Increases your chance to freeze and converts lightning blast and volcanic orb to cold spells, changing their base damage type to cold and giving them a chance to freeze.

Lightning Blast gains a base freeze rate of 46.

nodeList.altText: Ward is a shield that protects your health. It has no maximum and decays over time.
nodeList.description:
You deal increased fire and lightning damage.

You gain ward when you use a lightning skill or a fire skill. This effect has a 10 second cooldown, but the cooldown is not shared between different elements, so you can gain ward from a fire skill and a lightning skill within the same 10 second duration.

nodeList.altText: This effect can chill the enemy you hit unless it is killed by the hit.
nodeList.description: Augments the ward gain effects of the {Reactive Ward} and {Sun and Storms} nodes, causing them to grant more ward and have shorter cooldowns.

Spark charges are spells that explode after 1 second, dealing lightning damage to enemies in an area.

nodeList.description: You can dual wield melee weapons by equipping a sword in your off hand. You take more damage while dual wielding (multiplicative with other modifiers).

GeneralTooltop.body: You must have this many points in your Base Class to put points into any Mastery Class. Reaching this point does not unlock your Mastery Classes
GeneralTooltop.title: Mastery Threshold
